name: foundation-ts
description: Typescript basic manipulation functions and classes

scripts.pack: npm run clean && npm run build && node dist/SetupPackage.js && cd dist && npm pack
scripts.publish: npm run clean && npm run build && node dist/SetupPackage.js && cd dist && npm pack && npm publish
scripts.test: npm run clean && tsc --project tsconfig.test.json && cp -R src/*.json tdist/src && node --async-stack-traces --experimental-modules tdist/test/index.test.js

author: Business Card Associates
